attributes.action: Stop Non - UK Born from Receiving Benefits
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to be far stricter with immigration of foreigners and stop the benefit cheats who get given a £2.5 million house in high end London streets, who have five children and do not or cannot work but continue to have more children at the expense of the taxpayer. It is always the middle class that that has to pay and why should we pay for foreigners to claim asylum and take all our hard earned money? Frankly I’ve had enough!
